title: BRIEF-Northern Vertex Mining Corp Completed Consolidation & Extension Of Outstanding Convertible Debt
text:
BRIEF-Northern Vertex Mining Corp Completed Consolidation & Extension Of Outstanding Convertible Debt

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Oct 11, 2019 18:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Northern Vertex Mining Corp Completed Consolidation & Extension Of Outstanding Convertible Debt Oct 11 (Reuters) - Northern Vertex (NASDAQ: ) Mining Corp : * COMPLETED CONSOLIDATION & EXTENSION OF OUTSTANDING CONVERTIBLE DEBT OWED TO GREENSTONE RESOURCES II L.P. * EXTENSION WILL ALLOW COMPANY TO PUT CASHFLOW FROM MOSS MINE IN ARIZONA * MATURITY DATE FOR DEBENTURE EXTENDED TO DECEMBER 1, 2020

BRIEF-Northern Vertex Mining Corp Completed Consolidation & Extension Of Outstanding Convertible Debt
description: BRIEF-Northern Vertex Mining Corp Completed Consolidation & Extension Of Outstanding Convertible Debt
